name: User fees
text: §150A-7.5  User fees.  Fees may be assessed for the processing and issuance of permits issued by the department under this part, for inspections related to permit conditions, and for the registration of microbial products containing certain strains of microorganisms, as established by rule. [L 1996, c 153, §1; am L 1999, c 177, §5; am L 2000, c 211, §6]
